website_summaries.verdict: Dr. Mercola's supplement isn't a bad option, but it holds no significant advantages over comparable supplements.
pros: 1,000 mg of krill oil per serving
Users have said that it helped their cholesterol levels and their brain fog
No need to refrigerate the capsules
cons: You must take 2 softgels per serving, though they are pretty small

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but could be improved.I expect a 100 percent high quality product from reading about it on the website.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the capsules are small, which makes it easy to swollow. It's a wonderful thing that Dr Mercola had combine the Omega 3 with Astaxanthin, which helps it to cross the brain barrier. Astaxanthin also helps with reducing inflamation. Impressive! The only thing I am not satisfied with is the capsule is be made of gelatin from tilapia. I really hope that it will be made from wild-caught tilapia in the future, for farmed fish are not healthy at all. Especially, lots of tilapia nowadays are imported from China. I expect the pruduct to be of high quality, meaning 100 percent from all high quality sources.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for Omega3s with no side effects.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a supplement? It's doing what it's supposed to do, I suppose -- provide Omega 3 fats with no derogatory side effects. I've been taking these for about 6 weeks with NO side effects that you normally get taking fish oil capsules (repeating, bad breath). None of that here. The packaging is good: the bottle is easy to open. The capsules are easy to take, they're not overly large. This is the first product I ordered from Mercola. I've been impressed so far. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This product actually does lower cholesterol levels!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product which has effectively lowered my husband's cholesterol level better than prescription medications which had undesirable side effects. Dr.Mercola's research and ultimate recommendations of this Krill oil have been proven trustworthy by months of use by my husband . We will continue to purchase this product as long as it maintains its current level of quality.
customer_reviews.author: stk

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking the krill oil over a week ago. I'd gotten out of the habit of taking it so decided to start it up again at my husbands insistence. The one big thing I noticed was how this krill oil made my pipes work amazingly, if you know what I mean. I have no other explanation for the change in my colon life. All I know is I'm never going to stop taking it!! I'm very satisfied with this Krill Oil!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy for dogs to ingest...Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I can see a huge difference in my dogs coat. They eat the capsule right along with their dog food no problem. And if there is any liquid added to the food the capsule melts very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jmax

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: The caption heading: ....... "60 capsules 1000mg"........NOT TRUE. There are: ... "60 capsules 500mg"...... FACT. Big difference in cost. Accuracy in the advert : poor.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much better than other krill I have tried. I thought I was allergic to krill because I tried mega red brand several times and it made my fingers and toes feel tight and swollen. I know how beneficial krill can be so I decided to try it again. I didn't have any adverse reactions so i'm happy I can continue to take this on a regular basis.

customer_reviews.title: Dr mercola krill oil is the best

customer_reviews.title: Broken capsule
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product many times and it always arrives quickly and well packaged. However, this time when I opened the bottle the cotton was discolored, it had a foul odor and all of the capsules were slimy. It appears one or several had opened or broken but I couldn’t tell because of the mess. Reordering another bottle and hopefully this was an isolated case.
customer_reviews.author: AMiller

customer_reviews.title: No nasty taste left in your mouth
customer_reviews.text: We both take these and so it's really easy to just order one click off Amazon and have them delivered to our door. They don't leave a nasty taste in your mouth like some brands do. Easy to pop in your mouth and swallow. Does the trick, I'm alive and kicking still! Oh and healthy according to my Dr.

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product for six years and never had a problem until recently when I received my order with the bottom broken out of the glass bottom that it comes in. This bottle of Krill Oil costs $78.97 and has 180 capsules. I have contacted Amazon, with no success, so I called Mercola. Mercola WILL NOT work with me on this because it was sold by a "second seller." I spent almost an hour reasoning with two people about "helping a loyal customer," with no success. I will continue trying to get my refund from Amazon.com, but I don't plan to ever order again from Dr. Mercola.

customer_reviews.title: Causes extreme HEARTBURN when other brands don't.
customer_reviews.text: Switched over from Nordic Naturals Krill Oil to try these: these gave me painful, raging heartburn within 15 minutes that lasted all day, along with fish burps that lasted for 3 hours. Compared to Nordic Naturals, which result in ZERO heartburn, and no fishy burps, these are startlingly violent on the digestive system... AND you've got to take more capsules to reach the recommended dose...AND it says you can only take them in the morning (what? why? so you can enjoy heartburn the whole day?). Total waste of money. Going to try to return. Will be ordering more of the Nordic Naturals Krill Oil instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Superb supplement!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing supplement!!! Love it! I have been a fan of Dr.Mercola for some time now and everything he says just makes sense. So I decided to try his krill Oil & it's absolutely unbelievable. My slight brain fog went away & my skin is looking better 7 better every day! Will be buying again. For those freaking out about fishy burps: yes, I have them sometimes, but not every day. But it personally doesn't bother me since it's made of seafood and is all natural, so what do you really expect? Regardless of the brand you take.

product_meta.title: Dr. Mercola Antarctic Krill Oil, 30 Servings (60 Capsules), MSC Certified, Non GMO, Soy-Free, Gluten Free
feature_bullets: Each Bottle of Krill Oil Contains 30 Servings
Following Dr. Mercola’s belief in providing the best quality products, this product is Gluten Free and Soy Free.
Supports a healthy heart, overall joint comfort and immune function

MSC certification and auditing ensures harvesting to manufacturing adheres to MSC’s chain of custody standard. Krill are harvested in a sustainable way that also ensures no non krill species is captured
All Dr. Mercola products are backed by a full 90-day money back guarantee. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, simply return it to us for your money back - no questions asked.
